text:
@washingtonpost If he were trying half as hard as he is to undermine mail-in voting and destroying the USPS, and to destroy U.S. cities,  to actually solve or even improve the coronavirus pandemic, he would be doing better in the eyes of the American voter.

But he' stuck in a grudge match.
